MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL45 postcode area of Llanbedr, affecting properties in the local area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulty locating an overhead line fault. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:51AM on 2nd November 2020
